sentences.cn: 长期潜藏着的记忆复活了.

sentences.en: As soon as they met again his dormant love for her was rekindled.
sentences.cn: 他们一见面,他对她的旧情如乾柴烈火般又重新燃起.

sentences.en: Bears lie dormant during the winter.
During the winter the seeds lie dormant in the soil.
sentences.cn: 冬天种子在土壤中休眠。

sentences.en: He would try to awake their dormant and sluggish faculties.
sentences.cn: 这位教授应该试图唤醒他们沉睡和懒散的天赋.

sentences.en: Many animals are in a dormant state during winter.
sentences.cn: 在冬天许多动物都处于睡眠状态.

sentences.en: Many living things are dormant in winter.
sentences.cn: 很多生物到了冬季都休眠.

sentences.en: Many plants lie dormant throughout the winter, ie alive but not growing.
sentences.cn: 许多植物冬天呈休眠状态.

sentences.en: Product development in this direction has not been entirely dormant.
sentences.cn: 这一产品开发工作并非整个处于蛰伏状态.

sentences.en: The pupae remain dormant in the soil until they emerge as adult moths in the winter.
sentences.cn: 蛹蛰伏在土壤中，直到冬天它们才蜕变成蛾子飞出来。

sentences.en: The science of electrostatics lay dormant for about 2,000 years.
The subject of orthogonal trajectories remained dormant.
sentences.cn: 正交轨线的问题一直处于沉寂状态.

sentences.en: The subject was dormant from 1750 to 1825.
sentences.cn: 从1750年到1825年这门学科处于休眠状态.

sentences.en: The virus remains dormant in nerve tissue until activated.
sentences.cn: 病毒潜伏于神经组织里直到被激活。

sentences.en: This dormant volcano suddenly fired up.
sentences.cn: 这座休眠火山突然爆发了.

words.tran_cn: [生物] 休眠，冬眠；[生物] 蛰伏

phrases.tran_cn: 休眠火山；睡火山，休火山

trans.tran_cn: 休眠的，蛰伏的，暂停活动的
trans.tran_en: not active or not growing at the present time but able to be active later
